website_summaries.verdict: A grill designed to hang on your tripod for a lot of over-fire grilling space.
pros: Round shape helps to maximize grilling space over a fire pit or campfire
Works well with a cooking spray
Small spaces between the wire openings give you versatility as far as what you can grill
Can sit directly on top of fire ring
cons: The biggest challenge is getting correct size for a fire ring
It might be best to order a size up

customer_reviews.title: Screen warps
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 19” which fits perfectly over a solo stove bonfire. Product is crudely made though and the screen warped considerably after only a few uses.....After many more uses the warping is proving to make grilling difficult for things like peppers or other “rolling foods” . I’m also unable to use a spatula because the surface isn’t flat. I’m not sure why it gets so many glowing reviews .
customer_reviews.author: PhilAnders

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - rusting, warping & overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I have a fire pit that I wanted to cook on, so I looked on Amazon and found this one. It was a great size to fit over the top of my pit. I used it 3 times to cook and it is already rusting and warping. I am so disappointed. I have not put anything heavy on it that it would warp. Cooked hot dogs, hamburgers, steak and baked potatoes. Nothing like cooking in the great outdoors! I think this grill is way overpriced considering what is happening.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: So far we have only used it once but so far so good. We put it over our fire pit to cook. So far it seems durable and serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Solid but doesn’t fit 30 grill
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. Should last for years. Why only 3 stars? Oddly it does not securely fit the 30 inch fire bowl I recently purchased from the same manufacturer. Another inch in diameter and the flange would slide down over the edge of the bowl. Instead it sits on top of the edge and and can slide around. Flipping it upside down helps but then the handles tilt downward. Very odd.
customer_reviews.author: Rascal

customer_reviews.title: this thing is GREAT! put it over my 32'' fire pit and ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW, this thing is GREAT! put it over my 32'' fire pit and grilled 42 burgers, 12 hot dogs, and 6 chicken breast. I had 5 adults and 6 grandkids and grilled everthing to perfection all at once. sprayed cooking spray on the grate for the first use and nothing stuck. well made, sturdy, nice and heavy and the handles do not get hot so its easy to move the grate over a bit to add some coals or wood which is exactly what I did. the added wood gave everything a great smoky flavor. i'm happy and I highly recommend if you have a big group to cook for. EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Faulk

customer_reviews.title: Turn your firpit into your BBQ, you will not regret it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to turn a fire pit into a grilling station. We cleared all the old wood out of the fire pit and filled it with briquette. We used this grill and cooked food that night. So divine. Afterward, we covered the firepit with a custom-fitting cover to protect the briquette from the rain. Done! We now have a giant outdoor grill which will cook enough food for a massive amount of people all at once. Try it! We have an outdoor Chimenea for our outdoor fireplace now, which is much better at controlling fire pit smoke.
customer_reviews.author: LalalalalaLalalala

customer_reviews.title: Good Grate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grate to cover a french drain that I installed in my side yard to collect and divert rainwater and road drainage flow. This is the only grate I could find over 23 inch diameter to cover the hole. I have installed a cinder block under the grate to provide support because I use a lawn servie to mow and I anticipate they will drive over this grate with a rider mower.
customer_reviews.author: EDWARD H WEBSTER

customer_reviews.title: Did a great job, nice and heavy.
customer_reviews.text: I followed another customers advice and oiled with a paper towel before I used it and nothing stuck. I had put trout on one side chicken and steak on the other side with veggies in the middle and It handled it all. Very stable and well made. I hung it on a large S hook when done to cool. This cooking grill worked perfect on our 26" fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Dressagediva44

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: this fit my new Cobra Co horse fire ring like it was made for it. So far I have used it mainly for keeping embers at bay but plan to cook out one night. right after I installed this, we experienced three weeks of continuous rain. But not a bit of rust has shown up yet. I haven't had any issues with paint peeling from the heat after a half dozen fires.
customer_reviews.author: Tim s.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great outdoor grill
customer_reviews.text: We use this to cook out over the fire. I was kidding about it being easy to clean. Not sure why anyone would ever do that.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine M-G

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!  I am the HAPPY, HAPPY, H A P P Y Person!!!  🤗👍❤️
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grill grate to hang from my Lodge cast iron tripod and I was overwhelmed with joy when I unboxed it. There is enough surface space on this grill grate to cook for myself AND a for my neighbors. WOW! WOW! W O W!!! and YAHOO!!! 😘👍🤗❤️
customer_reviews.author: Ricky L.

customer_reviews.title: Good grate but not a great grate
customer_reviews.text: The mesh is on the light side, not heavy enough to leave pronounced grill marks, and the fit on my 19" kettle grill is not the best, but it does work. Overall, I like it well enough to keep it, but I'm uncertain about recommending it. I'm still looking for something like this with heavier mesh.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff in NM

customer_reviews.title: Product is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I am returning the grate, because it is 24" on the top, but when you turn it over to measure it is about 23 1/2. I needed it to be a full 24". Other than that. it seems like a good product.
customer_reviews.author: RoPaz

customer_reviews.title: The hit of our beach campout
customer_reviews.text: We hosted 70 people for dinner at a beach campsite for my husband's 50th birthday. The only way to cook was over a 40" fire pit. This grill was perfect and all the men present admired it! It did warp a bit in the middle over the heat (the reason for 4 rather than 5 stars) but still performed beautifully. Now, we're going to install a fire pit in our back yard so we can enjoy it more often!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Expanded metal grate is bowed upward causing food to roll off
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointed with this. The grate is not level with the outer ring. New out of the box it bowes upward causing food to roll right off of it. Had to hang it upside down in the tripod, things will still roll around but not off into the fire. Seems expensive for some curved angle iron and expanded metal.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Kind of overpriced..
customer_reviews.text: Kinda expensive for the item..but it was for a birthday present.. expected it to atleast fit inside the lip of a barrel, but had a inch gap around it..overall it looked nice but not $50 nice
customer_reviews.author: Derle Paxton

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly over our fire pit made from an old steel drum. When you can buy a good clean used drum for $10 and cut it down into a couple of 12in high fire pits, then put this on top, you can't go wrong
customer_reviews.author: David M. Calaman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This grill fit my firepit (the kit from Lowe's!) absolutely perfectly! I took the time to use a bit of lard while it was very hot to "season" the grate, just like I would with any piece of cast iron cookware. It works absolutely perfectly! I fit 18 burgers and 12 Nathan's foot longs, and still had a little room :). I definitely recommend this product so far!
customer_reviews.author: Candace M. Musmeci

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for price
customer_reviews.text: This grate came ad described. Fit great over our fire ring. Did warp a bit after first use but I am not sure you will find a grate that won’t warp. It is great to cook on.
customer_reviews.author: Liz White

customer_reviews.title: Backyard grilling
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for backyard grilling over my fire pit. It’s great. But it should be cleaned and treated like cast iron or wok, otherwise it rusts.
customer_reviews.author: shinkimchi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I love this grate it fits perfectly on my open fire pit. I have cooked on it two times and it cleans easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gave money back
customer_reviews.text: It seemed great , but we just got it this year and it buckled from the heat, they DID give us our money back
customer_reviews.author: marybeth

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad...
customer_reviews.text: Because of the looseness in the center, I will be welding a 1/4 x1/2 bar in the center to stabilize the grating.
customer_reviews.author: ole 45 mag

customer_reviews.title: Not as heavy as stated. Maybe 3-5 lbs
customer_reviews.text: It’s a decent product but not as heavy as it says it is. Maybe 3-5lbs. It’s ok but not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: jdk1979

customer_reviews.title: Need to change payment information!
customer_reviews.text: Charged to incorrect credit card!!!!!!! Sturdy and just what I ask for!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Pressley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: Its actually pretty nice! Pretty sturdy too. BUT... left it out one night (and it happened to rain) and the next morning I noticed it was ALREADY starting to rust :( was disappointed in that. Will just have to remember to not leave it out on top of the pit.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Mahood

customer_reviews.title: Nice fire pit cover!
customer_reviews.text: We use this item as a cover for our stone fire pit. It’s attractive and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: JChopkins

customer_reviews.title: Great delivery on time and great produce
customer_reviews.text: Great delivery on time and great produce! Reasonable price and I love it very much! Hope more often going camping!
customer_reviews.author: Roger Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived and was packed well. Put it to use soon as I could, as you can see here. Highly recommend this cooking grate for your outdoor pit! Wonderfully built and finished!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Holgate

customer_reviews.title: Great grill for the top of my 30" fire ring
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to grill on top of my 30" fire ring -- also bought here on Amazon. They are made by different companies, but they fit perfectly together. My fire ring is assembled with silver bolts, which stood out and looked horrible. This grate had a bit more shine to the finish than the ring. so I bought a can of flat Black Heat spray paint made for BBQ pits and I sprayed the ring and this grate the same color ! Now they not only fit perfectly together, they are the same shade of black. I will post a photo.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This was at my door in the 2 days as advertised. Just enough time to get it set up over our existing fire pit. I mis-calculated the size of the fire pit so the grate was too small, but that's not the seller's fault! We cooked shishkabobs on the grill and it stood up very well to the flames with very little to no warping. It is easy to clean and looks pretty sturdy, so we'll get use out of this for years to come
customer_reviews.author: A-10

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this product's construction; very durable; very heavy; well made! Was a bit more pricey than what I wanted or expected to pay, but I wanted a larger, circular-type design so it can fit on my fire pit or any other campground's fire pit. Can't wait to use it as I travel in my RV full-time, so look forward to some great cookouts.
customer_reviews.author: John Lee Bass

customer_reviews.title: BUY DIS PRODUCT... OR ELSE!
customer_reviews.text: Eye like the maaateareal! So, check it out; buy one yerself; this too big to rest on a shelf. Stakes stuffed with marshmallows, korm cooked in husk; dis product tis dureeable, but filling of stakes doth nelt.
customer_reviews.author: David Young

customer_reviews.title: Enamel chipped, otherwise sturdy and true to size
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with enamel chipped in several places. I’m sure it will rust quickly since the metal is exposed. Grate is sturdy and has held up to the heat of several fires so far.
customer_reviews.author: CEOofFour

customer_reviews.title: allows you to cook on the embers and produces better than charcoal food in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: This thing fits perfectly on my fire pit, allows you to cook on the embers and produces better than charcoal food in my opinion. At the end of the nigh when folks get hungry again, I throw on some brats and dogs, and no need to go fire up the grill again. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Fishing Pal

customer_reviews.title: Tractor rim cover
customer_reviews.text: We have a redneck fire pit made from an old 36" tractor rim. This cover fit perfectly and made us much more comfortable enjoying nice fires with much less fear of the kids being nearby.
customer_reviews.author: MnW

customer_reviews.title: Heavy screen but not immune to heat
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it once, but we managed to warp it using it over a "solostove"
customer_reviews.author: Spencer M

customer_reviews.title: I bought the 30 inch diameter version and it was ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 30 inch diameter version and it was designed in such a way that the rim is a few inches shorter in diameter so it did not fit over my 30 inch custom copper fire pit. Too much trouble to return something that big so I placed it on top - much less stable - and less function but it is what it is. They should disclose more about the dimensions and offer a diagram. It's otherwise ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: This thing is made in China and I think the person who made it was either blind or drunk! The welds are pathetic and the thing is warped. Just opened it and sending it back. So disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Mistey

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase. It’s heavy duty and big. We have been using often since we purchased. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: CBR

customer_reviews.title: a great purchase and we expect to use it many times ...
customer_reviews.text: Grill came within just a couple days of ordering. Fits the fire pit perfectly. Since we are probably the only Californians without a grill, we hoped to be able to bar-b-que on it. We did hot dogs with our grandchildren first, but didn't realize the grill is slightly domed...and they went rolling! Solved the problem and expect that other (flatter) items will stay put. Overall, a great purchase and we expect to use it many times in the future. Definitely a 5 star item!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Kusanovich

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfectly over the burn barrel.
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time finding a 24" grate to replace the one I use for cooking every week on our burn barrel at the horse shoe pists. This is more than I wanted to spend but it is a high quality product and will serve well for many years. I'm very glad that I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it, I put sauteed chicken breast in it. They turned out so delicious!!! And they never stuck to the grate!!!! Amazing!! Even heat across the whole grate!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight and great for grilling on the fire pit
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what we needed for our fire pit. Have not started a fire yet. (It’s too hot outside!)
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl colby

customer_reviews.title: Cooking at the Property with the fire pit cooking grate
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Worked perfect over a built in fire pit. We were able to cook steaks, corn, baked potatoes and asparagus all at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Ray-Ray

customer_reviews.title: This has been great! We need to use it upside down
customer_reviews.text: This has been great! We need to use it upside down, or hotdogs would roll right off the grate, but other than that it's great! The grate was bowed outward upon arrival. Works grate upside down! :)
customer_reviews.author: James P. Shiloh

customer_reviews.title: Temperate with a fire before you put food on it who knows what kind of paint the Chinese use
customer_reviews.text: Are use this to weld up a swinging grill grate for my fire pit it works great, celebrated with ribeyes
customer_reviews.author: Preedut Jeepta

customer_reviews.title: ... took it camping this last weekend and it worked great..
customer_reviews.text: We just took it camping this last weekend and it worked great.....however we cut the handles off so it would fit within our tripod that we use to cook over the fire. We love it!! It's nice and big and that lip keeps anything from rolling off. This is our third grill for our tripod and it is the best .
customer_reviews.author: Janell Walker

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product!
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to fit a 55 gal drum. It fit perfectly! Great, high-quality product.
customer_reviews.author: MIKEL R NYBO

customer_reviews.title: Fire Pit Grill
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size grill for my fire pit. The grating is tough duty and it was the same size as the description.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 40 in. and was sent a 36 in. A return was made and I was sent the 40 in. All with no cost to me, so all is good, just a little inconvenience. It's a nice heavy grate that can be cooked on and keep embers from starting a forest fire. LIKE IT !!
customer_reviews.author: T C

customer_reviews.title: Fit and function perfect
customer_reviews.text: The grill fits, will be perfect function for my pit and I'm glad I ordered a few inches larger that the diameter of the pit. We have not used it but delivery was rapid, in a few days and in great shape. Painted flat black and ready for outside durability.
customer_reviews.author: frostynels

customer_reviews.title: Great for Grilling over a firepit.
customer_reviews.text: It's great for grilling and also can be used to keep down spark emissions when using papers to start a fire. I am completely satisfied and highly recommend this product. Because it is thicker and heavier than it appears in the photo it should last for a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mishock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: The grill looks very nice atop my fire pit. I haven't used it yet to cook on, but it is sturdy enough to hold the weight of anything that I will want to grill. I would say it is medium weight. Light enough to easily lift to add more wood and heavy enough to stand up to the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on our fire pit. Very heavy construction so we can put a big pot on it for low country boil
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Imbert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its exactly what we needed for our fire pit. Well built and dimensioned well.
customer_reviews.author: CADR&CMDR

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction and attractive finish - I am completely satisfied. I feel like I got my money's worth. I do wish the company also sold the chain/hooks to suspend the grill, but that is something I can make on my own.
customer_reviews.author: Roger M

customer_reviews.title: So far, it is great!
customer_reviews.text: I give it 4-stars for now, only because I have had it for only a short time, and only used it once. But . . . It arrived on time. It arrived in great condition. And it cooked a flank steak over some firewood perfectly. So, so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Dragonchef

customer_reviews.title: Half Pan knows
customer_reviews.text: Nice BBQ grill surface. Handles on Both sides works well.
customer_reviews.author: Half pan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: This thing works amazingly with my 39" fire ring. Cooked food for 15 people on it. Holds a lot of weight - easily 10 lbs of food.
customer_reviews.author: Mexico Magico

customer_reviews.title: at the price it was ok
customer_reviews.text: product came damaged. not enough packing in box . also was not the dim. as advertised and will have to modify to make it work. other than that it will work ok.
customer_reviews.author: robert stricklin

customer_reviews.title: Really beautiful topper for my fire pit and at an awesome price also.
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful topper for my fire pit. Awesome price also. Highly recommend product and this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Picard321

customer_reviews.title: Looks great as long as you don't actually put it over a fire.
customer_reviews.text: Really strange, but this grill started melting and warping when we put it over the fire for just a few minutes. It also gave off a smell that I think was the finish burning off. Sorry to say, it had to go back.
customer_reviews.author: juliemvh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best grill for all of your veggies and meats makes the flavor of food mouth watering good
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Even with minor buckling the is a high-end grill choice.
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill, which fits over my fire ring surround perfectly. The heat has given it some warp to the middle, like waves. That doesn't bother me, or cook the food any differently. I recommend this if you're looking for something more substantial than a chrome circle grill.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle C McDowell

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, used once and bowed a little bit but ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, used once and bowed a little bit but that's to be expected. Three stars because for the price (37.5in $104) it doesn't feel as solid as I would have hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: Fun times in quarantine!
customer_reviews.text: We are really loving this. Awesome fire pit, awesome price!
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: Well made and works great!
customer_reviews.text: This grill fits perfectly over my fire pit, is sturdy and works great! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it's heavy enough to cook over the campfire.
customer_reviews.text: Have haven't used it yet but fits over our fire pit. Heavy, think it will work as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The look is fitted and looks custom.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this grate to fit over the 30" opening of our fire pit kit from Lowe's. The fit is perfect thanks to the handles. They are what keep the grate from dropping in. The look is fitted and looks custom.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W.

customer_reviews.title: This fire pit cover is perfect! The size
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit cover is perfect! The size, quality and style is exactly as described. Great deal for anyone who wants to utilize their fire pit as a grill... we'll be using charcoal!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made can’t wait to try it out once weather cooperates
customer_reviews.author: Carla B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Grill, Guys
customer_reviews.text: This is great! We've cooked a few times on it now, no warping, no peeling, and it's stood up to my wire brush and scraper for cleaning too. Easy to use - I just drop it on the cooking fire when I'm ready (and wince because I'm an idiot and get smoke in my eyes every time) and it's time to grill! Really liked the incremental sizes they had available too - this one is exactly the right diameter for our pit. Oh - and storage is great too - the handle is sturdy enough, we just hung it from the ceiling in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Mr C

customer_reviews.title: perfect..
customer_reviews.text: perfect...used it on a block fire pit kit I bought at Lowe's. Looks like it was custom made for it and it keeps the dogs out of the pit between uses.
customer_reviews.author: canbeonly1

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and perfect size for our fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and perfect size for our fire pit. The grid is a good size for grilling meat and vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Thinner metal than I was expecting. Delivered the very next day.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lanning

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For me this was a find. I have a "home make" fire pit and this fits it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: The2Cs

customer_reviews.title: ... of a fire pit I have and it is great. Works perfectly and is very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I used this on top of a fire pit I have and it is great. Works perfectly and is very sturdy. I love the handles.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Screen
customer_reviews.text: I used this screen to cover our small pond. Works great and is nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy but not so heavy it's unweildy! Looks good too. Grates are close enough together that cooking is easy, no fall through. Easy to clean as well; of course a flaming marshmallow was squished the first time we used it ;) Shipping was zippy as always with Prime
customer_reviews.author: Prettypants

customer_reviews.title: Make sure when you order your fire pit grill that you get the right size for your fire pit
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this fire pit grill, I've used it for grilling all types of things from hotdogs to steaks
customer_reviews.author: kenneth burnley

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The cooking grill itself is sturdy and has held up to some large fires. Cooking surface allowed hamburgers to be cooked without sticking and breaking and the holes are so small, items don't fall through. Only downside is that there is rust at the joints where they're soddered. Overall I would recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Took it out of the box and put it right ...
customer_reviews.text: Took it out of the box and put it right back in for return. This thing will not hold up. It weighs about 2lbs. Very thin steel. Once the paint burns off it will rust and fall apart. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: trace

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I use this as a fire screen on a burn barrel and it works very well. Size is great; sturdy but not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lupton

customer_reviews.title: Great grill for fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I have had it for a couple of months and grilled everything from steaks to burgers and rack of lamb.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas W. Lim

customer_reviews.title: This has turned my back yard firepit into quite the sensation in our neighborhood
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing I found that fit the 38" diameter circular fire pit I built in my back yard. So far I've cooked burgers on it for a large group (it easily handles up to a dozen large burgers at once, cooked over maple hardwood coals -- delicious!) and next I'll try steaks. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence (Larry) Short

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting, the metal is not ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting, the metal is not heavy duty as I was hoping. Only time will tell if it will last.
customer_reviews.author: CPT

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the opportunity to use it yet, but it is exactly as expected. Got it to set up over a fire pit. Dimensions are accurate and grill is sturdy. Will try to update this post once I've had the opportunity to use it to describe how it holds up to the heat.
customer_reviews.author: AKD

customer_reviews.title: Nice topper for fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Bought the fire pit ring with cooking grate so it does not fit on tightly but still is very useful for cooking chicken, etc.
customer_reviews.author: PDEUEL

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect grill to put on top of your fire pit once you get the nice bed of coals.
customer_reviews.author: Mule42

customer_reviews.title: Cost too much.
customer_reviews.text: Big Honkin' Grate. Works as advertised but under extreme heat the grate will start buckling and become un-even.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy J

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: works fine but it arrived bent in three places at the underside rim.
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Lots of bergers
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package my first thought is it is not as heavy duty as I would have liked. The heat from my large kettle fire pit caused some warping to the screen. This has not proven to be a problem last year I grilled 4-5 times with it for parties and the crowd loved it. I can get about 15-18 bergers on it and 12 hots at the same time. If big is better than this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Designer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time yesterday on my new fire pit. It's heavy duty and well made. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lyricalfrog

customer_reviews.title: Fit great over stone fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as stated......packaging inferior quality.....product as advertised. Fit great over stone fire pit....ordered oversized to lay across stone surround.
customer_reviews.author: Newmilneum

customer_reviews.title: Use heavier metal
customer_reviews.text: Wanted the grate screen to more sturdy as not to bend.
customer_reviews.author: robert facca

customer_reviews.title: It is heavy and sturdy. Fits my fire pit wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: It is heavy and sturdy. Fits my fire pit wonderfully. Hopefully Winter will end soon and I can try it out!
customer_reviews.author: S. B. Conway

customer_reviews.title: Grillin' Time
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had a chance to use it yet, but it is of high quality and fit our fire pit perfectly. Look forward to an old fashioned hot dog cookout and smores.
customer_reviews.author: L. Britt

customer_reviews.title: Order it. It works.
customer_reviews.text: It works great. If you need this, this will work.
customer_reviews.author: C. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Fire pit cooking
customer_reviews.text: Works great over 30 inch fire pit!! Easy to clean. I also used non stick grill pads with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
